name: dislikeable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unpleasant and easy to dislike : She creates a character who is as intriguing as she is dislikeable. In the documentary, he emerged as a thoroughly dislikeable man.
More examplesFewer examplesHe could hardly be a more dislikeable character.It's not a dislikeable film, but it is an unconvincing one. He describes a community of murderers and cheats, all of them dislikeable on sight. His dislikeable heroes are hard to spend time with, even before the nastiness starts.
